item.title: Merge branch 'master' into master
item.description:
https://frontaid.io/ - Headless CMS that stores JSON content directly in your own Git repository. No restrictions.
https://calendly.com - Calendly is the tool for connecting and scheduling meetings. Free plan provides 1 Calendar connection per user and Unlimited meetings. Desktop and Mobile apps also provided.
https://flutterflow.io - — Build your Flutter App UI without writing a single line of code. Also has a Firebase integration. Free plan includes full access to UI Builder and Free templates.
https://cdnjs.com/ - Simple. Fast. Reliable. Content delivery at its finest. cdnjs is a free and open-source CDN service trusted by over 11% of all websites, powered by Cloudflare.
https://www.jsdelivr.com/ - A free, fast, and reliable CDN for open source. Supports npm, GitHub, WordPress, Deno, and more.
https://directus.io - Automatically generates a dynamic REST and GraphQL API for any SQL database.
https://directus.io - Headless CMS. A completely free and open-source platform for managing assets and database content on-prem or in the Cloud. No limitations or paywalls.
https://directus.io - — Directus as a service. An open-source data platform that automatically generates a dynamic REST and GraphQL API for pure SQL databases.
https://duckly.com/ - Talk and collaborate in real-time with your team. Pair programming with any IDE, terminal sharing, voice, video and screen sharing. Free for small teams.
https://bookmarkos.com - Free all-on-one bookmark manager, tab manager, and task manager in a customizable online desktop with folder collaboration.
https://nic.eu.org - Free eu.org domain. Request is usually approved in 14 days.
https://nic.eu.org - Free eu.org domain. Request is usually approved in 14 days.
https://fakermail.com/ - Free, temporary email for testing with last 100 email accounts stored.
https://deepnote.com - A new kind of data science notebook. Jupyter-compatible with real-time collaboration and running in the cloud. Free tier includes unlimited personal projects, up to 750 hours of standard hardware and teams with up to 3 editors.
https://getstream.io/ - Build scalable newsfeeds, activity streams, chat and messaging in a few hours instead of weeks

https://duckly.com/ - Talk and collaborate in real-time with your team. Pair programming with any IDE, terminal sharing, voice, video and screen sharing. Free for small teams.
https://robocorp.com - Open-source stack for powering Automation Ops. Try out Cloud features and implement simple automations for free. Robot work 240 min/month, 10 Assistant runs, Storage of 100 MB.
https://www.softacheck.com/ - An online tool that performs static analysis for C/C++ code using open source tools such as cppcheck and clang-tidy and automatically generates code documentation for users using doxygen. This tool is free for use.
https://recaptchame.com/ - free reCAPTCHA and hCAPTCHA backend service. No Server-Side coding needed. Works for static websites.
https://zoho.com/subscriptions - Recurring Billing management free for 20 customers/subscriptions & 1 user with all the payment hosting done by Zoho themselves. Last 40 subscription metrics are stored
https://www.shakebugs.com/ - In-app bug reporting and feedback tool for mobile apps. Free plan, 10 bug reports per app/per month.
https://smartmockups.com/ - Create product mockups, 200 free mockups.
https://updrafts.app - WYSIWYG web site builder for tailwindcss based designs. Free for non-commercial usage.
https://www.bearer.sh/ - Helps implement privacy by design via audits and continuous workflows so that organizations comply with GDPR and other regulations. Free tier is limited to smaller teams and SaaS version only.
https://herotofu.com/ - Forms backend with bot detection and encrypted archive. Forward submissions via UI to email, Slack, or Zapier. Use your own frontend, no server code required. Free plan gives unlimited forms and 50 submissions per month.
https://railway.app - Railway is an infrastructure platform where you can provision infrastructure, develop with that infrastructure locally, and then deploy to the cloud. 3 Projects, 2 Plugins / Project, 2 Environments / Project, 3 Live Deploys / Environment available for free.

https://pravatar.cc/ - Generate random/placeholder fake avatar, which url can be directly hotlinked in your web/app.
https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/encrypted-dns/dns-over-https/make-api-requests - Free public DNS Resolver which is fast and secure (encrypt your DNS query), provided by CloudFlare. Useful to bypass your internet provider's DNS blocking, prevent DNS query spying, and [to block adult & malware content](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/1.1.1.1-for-families). Can also be used [via API](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/encrypted-dns/dns-over-https/make-api-requests). Note: Just a DNS resolver, not a DNS hoster.
